title: Basic HTML and CSS
description: What is CSS and HTML? HTML (the Hypertext Markup Language) and CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) are two of the core technologies for building Web pages. HTML provides the structure of the page, CSS the (visual and aural) layout, for a variety of devices.
outcomes: Offline Capabilities (PWA) with Cache API & Service Workers.

title: Git and Github
description: Git is a DevOps tool used for source code management. It is a free and open-source version control system used to handle small to very large projects efficiently. Git is used to tracking changes in the source code, enabling multiple developers to work together on non-linear development.

title: Intermediate Javascript
description: What is JavaScript and why is it used? Image result for what is javascript Javascript is used by programmers across the world to create dynamic and interactive web content like applications and browsers. JavaScript is so popular that it's the most used programming language in the world, used as a client-side programming language by 97.0% of all websites.
outcomes: Scripting Language. JavaScript is a lightweight scripting language made for client-side execution on the browser.
Functions as First-class citizens(supports functional programming)

title: React Fundamentals
description: React is a JavaScript library developed by Facebook which, among other things, was used to build Instagram.com. Its aim is to allow developers to easily create fast user interfaces for websites and applications alike. The main concept of React. js is virtual DOM.
outcomes: JSX is a JavaScript syntactic extension.
The Virtual DOM is React's lightweight version of the Real DOM.
React goes beyond just being a UI framework; it contains many extensions that cover the entire application architecture.

title: Firebase Authentication
description: Google Firebase is a Google-backed application development software that enables developers to develop iOS, Android and Web apps. Firebase provides tools for tracking analytics, reporting and fixing app crashes, creating marketing and product experiment.
outcomes: Unlimited Reporting. It allows for reporting of 500 distinct events.
Audience Segmentation. We can identify custom audiences in the Firebase console based on device data, custom events, or user properties.

title: Node with Express
description: It is a used as backend service where javascript works on the server-side of the application. This way javascript is used on both frontend and backend. Node. js runs on chrome v8 engine which converts javascript code into machine code, it is highly scalable, lightweight, fast, and data-intensive.
